value.latex:
Convergence et calcul de :
$$
\int_{0}^{\infty }\frac{dx}{1+\cosh ^{2}x}, \
\int_{1}^{\infty }\frac{dx}{\sinh x}, \
\int_{-\infty }^{\infty }\frac{dt}{\cosh t}.$$
value.html: Convergence et calcul de : \[\int_{0}^{\infty }\frac{dx}{1+\cosh ^{2}x}, \ \int_{1}^{\infty }\frac{dx}{\sinh x}, \ \int_{-\infty }^{\infty }\frac{dt}{\cosh t}.\]
